entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
